com.appsrox.instachat

Class SettingsActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper

                • com.appsrox.instachat.SettingsActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.preference.PreferenceFragment.OnPreferenceStartFragmentCallback, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class SettingsActivity
extends android.preference.PreferenceActivity
    A PreferenceActivity that presents a set of application settings. On handset devices, settings are presented as a single list. On tablets, settings are split by category, with category headers shown to the left of the list of settings.

    See Android Design: Settings for design guidelines and the Settings API Guide for more information on developing a Settings UI.

    • Field Detail

      • ALWAYS_SIMPLE_PREFS

        private static final boolean ALWAYS_SIMPLE_PREFS
        Determines whether to always show the simplified settings UI, where settings are presented in a single list. When false, settings are shown as a master/detail two-pane view on tablets. When true, a single pane is shown on tablets.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • sBindPreferenceSummaryToValueListener

        private static android.preference.Preference.OnPreferenceChangeListener sBindPreferenceSummaryToValueListener
        A preference value change listener that updates the preference's summary to reflect its new value.

      • isXLargeTablet

        private static boolean isXLargeTablet(android.content.Context context)
        Helper method to determine if the device has an extra-large screen. For example, 10" tablets are extra-large.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        Returns:
        true, if is x large tablet

      • isSimplePreferences

        private static boolean isSimplePreferences(android.content.Context context)
        Determines whether the simplified settings UI should be shown. This is true if this is forced via ALWAYS_SIMPLE_PREFS, or the device doesn't have newer APIs like SettingsActivity.GeneralPreferenceFragment, or the device doesn't have an extra-large screen. In these cases, a single-pane "simplified" settings UI should be shown.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        Returns:
        true, if is simple preferences

      • onBuildHeaders

        public void onBuildHeaders(java.util.List<android.preference.PreferenceActivity.Header> target)
        Overrides:
        onBuildHeaders in class android.preference.PreferenceActivity

      • bindPreferenceSummaryToValue

        private static void bindPreferenceSummaryToValue(android.preference.Preference preference)
        Binds a preference's summary to its value. More specifically, when the preference's value is changed, its summary (line of text below the preference title) is updated to reflect the value. The summary is also immediately updated upon calling this method. The exact display format is dependent on the type of preference.
        Parameters:
        preference - the preference
        See Also:
        sBindPreferenceSummaryToValueListener
